Articles.Content: Yeah, this is an introduction post. Seriously though, half of my parts are modded parts, and they all add new, wonderful functions into the game. I like the Damned Robotics pack, the Kerbal Attachment System, and the KW Rocketry pack. It's all very nice that we already have a huge, contributive community for an early alpha game. I love it. And no, I'm not going to say anything about myself. What do you mean it's an introduction post?!

Don't worry about not introducing yourself, I never did. You should also try out the ISA Mapsat mod, Kethane and RemoteTech. Each one adds to the challenge of the game. For a hard challenge you could consider the life-support mod too, though that makes the game insanely difficult.

Welcome anyway!
I enjoy mods but i quite often jut like to play the game with none.

Don't worry about not introducing yourself, I never did. You should also try out the ISA Mapsat mod, Kethane and RemoteTech. Each one adds to the challenge of the game. For a hard challenge you could consider the life-support mod too, though that makes the game insanely difficult.

Welcome anyway!

Funnily I do have the Mapsat and Kethane(along with plenty of other ones), but I was too lazy to relaunch my satellites to install RemoteTech.
